body:
There are [at least] two different URL's one can use to fetch tarballs of release from GitHub:

```
https://github.com/hpc/dtcmp/releases/download/v1.0.3/dtcmp-1.0.3.tar.gz

http://github.com/xianyi/OpenBLAS/archive/v0.2.15.tar.gz
```

Should I prefer one of them?

g.
title: Any reason to prefer "archive" vs "download" GitHub URLs for tarballs?
